name: Car Tag
description:
Challenge your friends (or enemies! After all, you do get to hit them as hard as you can!) in this fast-paced, online multiplayer driving game! Out-maneuver other drivers to tag someone if you're it or avoid being tagged if you're not! Stay close, but not too close to the tagger to get as many points as possible before the 2 minute round ends. Fly off of ramps, dive into the water, hide in a shipwreck, race over sand dunes through cacti, all just to tag or avoid being tagged.

Join the discord: https://discord.gg/wTJpanbvHV
